title: AFK Bans...
body: I play quite a lot, and yes, I do forgot to click accept when a game comes up because Im out of my chair, or my computer shuts down, but I was wondering... Is there any way for me not to get these 20 minute lower priority queue things? I NEVER leave games intentionally. I always try to play to win, also whats the difference between a decline and no response? People who wait in queue and decline the match delay the game for others waiting, just like the afk people.

replies.body: It's possible to receive a lower priority queue for constantly declining or not responding to match queues.  Even if it's not intentional, it still causes a negative experience for other players who are trying to get into a game.  Your best bet is to play when you are ready to commit to the duration of the match.  Hope that helps clear things up!
